hero.title: Zayit
hero.subtitle: The study library that goes straight to the text
hero.description: A free app to read, search, and explore Jewish study texts. Built for study: fast search, smooth navigation, clean citations.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Zayit is a dream turned useful: a natural, fluid, almost obvious study experience. The project will remain free by principle. Support is welcome and meaningful. It is designed to stay non-commercial. With God's help, Zayit will keep growing without losing its spirit.

spirit.title: In the spirit of a study hall
spirit.description: Zayit is designed like a digital study hall: stable, fast, consistent. You feel the calm of study: everything works, everything is in its place. The text stays at the center, with respect and without distractions.

interface.title: A pro and natural interface
interface.description: Built on JetBrains technologies, including Compose Desktop and Jewel. Inspired by Google Chrome and IntelliJ IDEA, it offers a professional interface that is fluid and natural, respects study, and does not strain the eyes.
interface.noLearning: You already know how to use it. No learning curve.
interface.bookSearchDesc: Use book acronyms to find any sefer instantly

panels.title: Modular panels
panels.description: The layout adapts instantly: organize the screen the way you want. Show, hide, compare, and tailor reading to your study style.
panels.commentariesDesc: Display multiple commentaries alongside the main text
panels.translationsDesc: Compare translations and commentaries side by side
panels.sourcesDesc: Instantly access source references and citations

search.title: An exceptional search engine
search.description: A powerful engine designed to understand texts, not just find them. The database was rebuilt to make search and navigation precise.
search.feature1: Find a passage even from a partial word or approximate spelling
search.feature2: Even without vocalization or cantillation marks, search stays clear and reliable
search.feature3: A partial phrase is often enough to reach the right place
search.feature4: Clean, readable, immediate results, useful for review and lesson prep
search.simpleDesc: Simple mode for core texts, advanced mode for the entire library.
search.powered: Powered by Lucene and enhanced by AI for precision

features.title: What Zayit lets you do
features.find: Find a passage in seconds with simple or advanced search
features.explore: Explore a library by book and table of contents
features.inbook: Search inside a book to prepare a lesson or review
features.compare: Show commentaries and translations side by side
features.sources: Access sources for a passage quickly
features.copy: Copy a clean excerpt to share in a lesson or with a study partner
features.themes: Switch instantly between light and dark themes

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.speedDesc: Exceptionally fast, even on old computers. Zayit is optimized to run smoothly on any machine, so you can focus on study, not on waiting.
promise.freeDesc: Zayit is free and will remain free. Always. This is a commitment, not a marketing promise.
promise.libraryDesc: A vast library of Jewish texts at your fingertips. Torah, Talmud, Halacha, Midrash, commentaries, and much more.
promise.offlineDesc: No internet required. Once installed, Zayit works completely offline. Your study is never interrupted.

crafted.title: Crafted with care
crafted.description: Zayit aims for quality and consistency: no gimmicks, no noise. Like a digital study desk, everything is there to move forward. Every detail is designed for natural, respectful study. Built to be fast, light, almost magical, it runs even on low-powered machines.

download.title: Download Zayit
download.description: Available for macOS, Windows, and Linux. Free and open source.
